Electronics
===========

This is Vicky Lin's section
Electronics are a fundamental part of making an FRC robot. This diagram below is a cursory overview of the wiring system in an FRC robot. We will explain each part in depth throughout these lessons.


.. image:: https://docs.wpilib.org/en/stable/_images/frc-control-system-layout.svg
   :width: 800
